item.title: ipdb - debug your python code easily
item.description: A debugger is tools that helps you to solve problems that are not understood in your scripts. It allows you to execute a program step by step, to study the execution of the code in real-time and to see the value of the variables at a precise place. You can debug your script as you wish; often a print is enough but in more complex cases you can use more advanced tool such as ipdb which is a combination of ipython and pdb
